about_the_game:
Meanders Map Pack Zombie Apocalypse


Welcome to my special nightmarish modern 34-map cityscape in the grips of a devastating zombie apocalypse. Travel the chaotic streets and brave the open air, leap from roof to roof to stay off the ground or take shelter inside and rummage for supplies in one of the 50+ shop interiors. Featuring my most complex and detailed map sets yet - let your imagination run wild amid gory scenes, burning cars, fortified rooftops, powerless authorities and absolute carnage with sad stories and tragic clues that scatter this gruesome setting weaving a classic tale of a city overrun - including one bridge in - or out.

It includes:

  • 18 Exterior Street Maps with Rooftop Settings
  • 15 Interiors with 50+ Individual Shops
  • bonus Black Ops Dossiers with some ideas on the possible source of the outbreak and 14 flavour-text mission briefs with unique conditions.

Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLES to pick your destination at random.

Converted by: Kris Mc Dermott

Released on October 25, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Meanders Map Pack Zombie Apocalypse


Welcome to my special nightmarish modern 34-map cityscape in the grips of a devastating zombie apocalypse. Travel the chaotic streets and brave the open air, leap from roof to roof to stay off the ground or take shelter inside and rummage for supplies in one of the 50+ shop interiors. Featuring my most complex and detailed map sets yet - let your imagination run wild amid gory scenes, burning cars, fortified rooftops, powerless authorities and absolute carnage with sad stories and tragic clues that scatter this gruesome setting weaving a classic tale of a city overrun - including one bridge in - or out.

It includes:

  • 18 Exterior Street Maps with Rooftop Settings
  • 15 Interiors with 50+ Individual Shops
  • bonus Black Ops Dossiers with some ideas on the possible source of the outbreak and 14 flavour-text mission briefs with unique conditions.

Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLES to pick your destination at random.

Converted by: Kris Mc Dermott

Released on October 25, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
